CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual=build-dependencies wget ca-certificates tar xz &&     wget "https://www.archlinux.org/packages/extra/x86_64/mono/download/" -O "/tmp/mono.pkg.tar.xz" &&     tar -xJf "/tmp/mono.pkg.tar.xz" &&     mozroots --import --ask-remove &&     apk del build-dependencies &&     rm /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
